TopicTitle: Folder Structure for VAB/SPH vehicle save folder

Articles.Content:
simple situation that everyone knows. at a certain point, the folder for the craft-files is just crowded. a way of having sub-folders for craft-files would be nice.

1. create subfolders ingame

2. create subfolders via the OS.

3. hop around within the subfolders.

should not be hard to do, and would offer a lot of extra convenience to the game.
This would be nice. We can definitely use some improved craft file management in the VAB and SPH.
I would love this. I'd also like a way to sort by part count, date created, and filter by all ships that have, say, a certain engine or science part.

I also suggested something like this before. but not the same thing.

I think it is a great idea
I would love this too. 5th Horseman's idea is great, but just having subfolder browsing would be a huge improvement.
All lists should (be able to) use folders, and this is one of such lists.
